sn1.42:1.2: Giving what do you give beauty?
sn1.42:1.3: Giving what do you give happiness?
sn1.42:1.4: Giving what do you give vision?
sn1.42:1.5: And who is the giver of all?
sn1.42:2.3: Giving a vehicle you give happiness.
sn1.42:2.4: Giving a lamp you give vision.
sn1.42:3.2: is the one who gives a residence.
sn1.42:3.3: But a person who teaches the Dhamma
sn1.42:3.4: gives the gift of the Deathless.”
